pullRequest.title: Update aad webapp sample
pullRequest.bodyText:
Remove AAD backend samples and create webapp sample to support v2 endpoints only. The webapp sample project covers the following features of aad auto-configuration:

Access control on user groups.
Visit multiple resources.
On-demand authorization.
